title: British Rock Bands - An Overview
subtitle: Exploring music, resources and connections about British rock bands with Wikidata.
description: This data story explores the resources related to British Rock music available on Wikidata, the centralized, linked data repository for all Wikimedia projects,  with the goal of overviewing this music genre from statistical point of view.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q145 . # from uk
     ?band wdt:P527 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 30

SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q145 . # from uk
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.text: British rock describes a wide variety of forms of music made in the United Kingdom. Since around 1964, with the "British Invasion" of the United States spearheaded by the Beatles, British rock music has had a considerable impact on the development of American music and rock music across the world.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(distinct ?band) as ?count) 
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q145 . # from uk
     ?band wdt:P737 ?influencer .
          SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?influencer rdfs:label         ?label.
      }
}

GROUP BY ?label ?count 
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 10
